data.title: Texas A&M Athletics
data.meta_description: Allison Chu (30) Guard - CAREER Two-time SEC Academic Honor Roll recipient Played in 13 career games 2014-15 HONORS SEC Academic Honor Roll Texas A&M Tea...
data.text:
CAREER

Two-time SEC Academic Honor Roll recipient

Played in 13 career games

2014-15 HONORS

SEC Academic Honor Roll

Texas A&M Team Academic Award

2014-15 HIGHLIGHTS

Awarded a scholarship on Dec. 16

Scored her first collegiate points by going 2-of-2 from the line against Northwestern State (Dec. 3)

2014-15 (SENIOR)

Earned the team’s Academic Award and named to the SEC Academic Honor Roll...Earned a scholarship for the spring semester on Dec. 16, after spending three semesters as a walk-on...Scored her first collegiate points on Dec. 3, going 2-of-2 from the line against Northwestern State...Corralled a rebound against Houston (Dec. 13)...Dished off her first career assist against North Texas (Dec. 31)...Scored a point against the Mean Green as well...Played in eight games, scoring three points

2013-14 HONORS

SEC Academic Honor Roll

2013-14SEASON HIGHLIGHTS

Collected four rebounds in five games

Averaged a pro-rated 17.8 rebounds per 40 minutes

JUNIOR (2013-14)

Played nine minutes in four games, collecting four rebounds … Averaged a pro-rated 17.8 rebounds per 40 minutes … Played point guard for A&M’s scout team during the season … Had two rebounds against Arkansas State (Dec. 30) … Took two shots against San Diego State (Dec. 3) … Made her collegiate debut at North Texas (Nov. 11), playing in front of friends and family who made the trip from nearby Plano

SOPHOMORE (2012-13)

Was on campus, but not a member of the team.

FRESHMAN (2011-12)

Was on campus, but not a member of the team.

HIGH SCHOOL CAREER

Named All-District and Academic All-District at Plano Senior High School ... Scored 32 points in a single game against Clark HS in 2009 ... Helped Plano to a District 5-5A Championship ... Named a Tuesday Standout by the Dallas Morning News (Jan. 25, 2011) for her clutch performance in an overtime win over Flower Mound.

PERSONAL

Allison Ka-Haye Chu ... Born October 30, 1992 in Plano, Texas ... Daughter of Alan and Olina Chu ... Has a brother, Anson ... Majoring in Sport Management, and hopes to work in the NBA following graduation ... Involved in several groups on campus, including Sigma Phi Omega Sorority, SMS/SMA club and PhilSA.
